upgrades.changelog:
* Includes firmware versions: 1.10, 1.20, 1.30, 1.40, 1.50, 1.60, 1.70, 1.80.
* Fixed a bug: The parent (root) device will update its state correctly now on select platforms.
* Fixed a bug: Solved an issue with the external switch not triggering the load in some edge cases.
* Fixed an issue with the connected load flickering on occasion.
* Added parameter 28: Separate the inputs from the outputs.
* Added parameter 29: DC Motor Mode.

* Includes firmware versions: 1.10, 1.20, 1.30, 1.40, 1.50, 1.60, 1.70
* Removed the delay when controlling the ZEN52 from the external mechanical switch when parameter 27 is set to value 0.
* Fixed bug: Both external switches can be triggered at the same time now.

* Includes firmware versions: 1.10, 1.20, 1.30, 1.40, 1.50, 1.60, 1.70
* Removed the delay when controlling the ZEN52 from the external mechanical switch when parameter 27 is set to value 0.
* Fixed bug: Both external switches can be triggered at the same time now.
